items.sentence: Aren't you even going to tell me your name?
I'm not saying that what she did was right.
I can't tell you how to pronounce the word.
It's not good to force our ideas on others.
I would go to the movies if I had the time.
I made a big mistake when choosing my wife.
The gathering was canceled because of rain.
My hand is so cold I can't feel it anymore.
Doing that took more time than we expected.
I don't think that you should've done that.
Tom was supposed to do that, but he didn't.
Why not just give Tom what he's asking for?
Three men attacked Tom and stole his money.
Tom borrowed a pair of sunglasses for Mary.
What kind of tires do you have on your car?
Everyone says I'm a chip off the old block.
Everyone here except you is from Australia.
If I don't try this now, I may never do it.
Mary kissed Tom, just to make John jealous.
It took Tom three years to build his house.
I've already been to the supermarket today.
Would you like it if Tom bossed you around?
Tom isn't used to this kind of hot weather.
Tom isn't likely to get much sleep tonight.
Tom is going to have a good time, I'm sure.
Tom told Mary that I was afraid to do that.
Tom told everybody he'd decided to do that.
Tom told everybody that he was very hungry.
Tom told everyone he was afraid to do that.
Tom told me he and Mary were still married.
Tom told me he thought Mary was unemployed.
Tom wants you to come to Australia with me.
Tom is supposed to go to Australia with me.
Tom didn't want to go to Australia with me.
Perhaps Tom will come to Australia with me.
I'm the only person Tom knows in Australia.
If I can help you with something, just ask.
Tom is hoping to get a chance to meet Mary.
You have to find something you enjoy doing.
Tom didn't realize that he'd been swindled.
Please leave the door open on your way out.
Mary didn't know that Tom had a girlfriend.
I doubt very seriously that'll impress Tom.
Tom threatened to set Mary's house on fire.
Tom and I used to often go hiking together.
The villagers set their own houses on fire.
There's no set schedule you have to follow.
Doing that won't take as long as you think.
This is the first time I've killed a mouse.
The world is more dangerous than I thought.
